title: City Car Simulator
fullContent: Home› 1 PlayerCity Car SimulatorBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full Screen City Car Simulator welcomes you into a real urban action with futuristic playground. This is a detailed stunt simulator that will make you explore every corner of the map. Jump on ramps, obstacles and drift your car around the area.You have the freedom to explore the cityscape and enjoy the speed and drift. After you selected the upgraded car by changing the color, plate ad spoiler then it's time too choose a mode:Free Drive Mission and Events Test Area and Entertainment Mission and Events You will have 30 missions to complete. Let's see what you have do to:• Level 1: Complete the track by jumping from roof to roof.(prize 100) • Level 2: Complete the track by jumping from roof to roof.(prize 150)• Level 3: Reach 100 points in the show area.(prize 200) • Level 4: Complete the circular track in the demonstration area.(prize 250)• Level 5: Fly 20 yards into the show area.(prize 500)• Level 6: Reach 200/kmh spee by car.(prize 550)• Level 7: Hit three cars in traffic.(prize 600)• Level 8: Go into the football stadium and send the ball to the castle.(prize 700)• Level 9: 50 hit the chair.(prize 750)• Level 10: Hit five sand deposits.(prize 850)• Level 11: Multiply 20 cones.(prize 900)• Level 12: Pass under the 3 airplanes at the airport.(prize 950)• Level 13: Use the ramp to jump to the opposite zone.(prize 975)• Level 14: Use the ramp to jump to the opposite zone.(prize 1000)• Level 15: Use the tunnel to reach the dam.(prize 1050)• Level 16: Follow the signs and reach the school.(prize 1100)• Level 17: Reach the deck of the ship in the harbor.(prize 1100)• Level 18: Hit 7 boxes.(prize 1300)• Level 19: Use the ramp to jump over the bridge.(prize 1500)• Level 20: Hit five traffic signs.(prize 1700)• Level 21: Jump on the closed parking lot and complete the track.(prize 1800)• Level 22: Go to the top floor of the parking lot and hit the target car.(prize 1900)• Level 23: Reach the upper floor of the parking lot and complete the course.(prize 2200)• Level 24: Use the ramp in the park to complete the track.(prize 2350)• Level 25: Hot 10 Street light poles in the park.(prize 2400)• Level 26: Jump on the closed parking lot and complete the track.(prize 2600)• Level 27: Complete the freeway before the time runs out.(prize 2650)• Level 28: Complete track.(prize 2800)• Level 29: Get off the constrution site and reach the target.(prize 2850)• Level 30: Termine o curso final.(prize 3000)City Car Simulator Display:• Km/h & Camera (displayed on the top left)• City Map & Options (displayed on the top right)Controls:WASD to control carSpace for handbrakeEscape to exit to menuTab to toggle pauseLeft Shift to boost carC to change cameraThis article was updated on February 19, 20241
